Edition provided is sold out - msg.sender is not the current highest bidder","return":"true on success"},"isEditionEnabled(uint256)":{"details":"Check an edition is enabled for success"},"removeAddressFromWhitelist(address)":{"details":"remove an address from the whitelist","params":{"_operator":"address"},"return":"true if the address was removed from the whitelist, false a"]},"openzeppelin-solidity/contracts/ownership/Ownable.sol":{"keccak256":"0x84c7090c27cf3657b73d9e26b6b316975fa0bd233b8169f254de0c3b3acfaefc","urls":["bzzr://b983355647976c1daa5de581a1b6a41be9c5adc17cce257b8679649db78f8a11"]}},"version":1}

nodes.documentation:
Auction V2 interface definition - event and method definitions
* https://www.knownorigin.io/
nodes.name: IAuctionV2

nodes.documentation:
@title Artists accepting bidding contract for KnownOrigin (KODA)
* Rules:
Can only bid for an edition which is enabled
Can only add new bids higher than previous highest bid plus minimum bid amount
Can increase your bid, only if you are the top current bidder
Once outbid, original bidder has ETH returned
Cannot double bid once you are already the highest bidder, can only call increaseBid()
Only the defined controller address can accept the bid
If a bid is revoked, the auction remains open however no highest bid exists
If the contract is Paused, no public actions can happen e.g. bids, increases, withdrawals
Managers of contract have full control over it act as a fallback in-case funds go missing or errors are found
On accepting of any bid, funds are split to KO and Artists - optional 3rd party split not currently supported
If an edition is sold out, the auction is stopped, manual refund required by bidder or whitelisted
Upon cancelling a bid which is in flight, funds are returned and contract stops further bids on the edition
Artists commissions and address are pulled from the KODA contract and are not based on the controller address
* Scenario:
1) Config artist (Dave) & edition (1000)
2) Bob places a bid on edition 1000 for 1 ETH
3) Alice places a higher bid of 1.5ETH, overriding Bobs position as the leader, sends Bobs 1 ETH back and taking 1st place
4) Dave accepts Alice's bid
5) KODA token generated and transferred to Alice, funds are split between KO and Artist
* https://www.knownorigin.io/
* BE ORIGINAL. BUY ORIGINAL.
nodes.name: ArtistAcceptingBidsV2

Auction V2 interface definition - event and method definitions
* https://www.knownorigin.io/
nodes.name: IAuctionV2

nodes.documentation:
@title Artists accepting bidding contract for KnownOrigin (KODA)
* Rules:
Can only bid for an edition which is enabled
Can only add new bids higher than previous highest bid plus minimum bid amount
Can increase your bid, only if you are the top current bidder
Once outbid, original bidder has ETH returned
Cannot double bid once you are already the highest bidder, can only call increaseBid()
Only the defined controller address can accept the bid
If a bid is revoked, the auction remains open however no highest bid exists
If the contract is Paused, no public actions can happen e.g. bids, increases, withdrawals
Managers of contract have full control over it act as a fallback in-case funds go missing or errors are found
On accepting of any bid, funds are split to KO and Artists - optional 3rd party split not currently supported
If an edition is sold out, the auction is stopped, manual refund required by bidder or whitelisted
Upon cancelling a bid which is in flight, funds are returned and contract stops further bids on the edition
Artists commissions and address are pulled from the KODA contract and are not based on the controller address
* Scenario:
1) Config artist (Dave) & edition (1000)
2) Bob places a bid on edition 1000 for 1 ETH
3) Alice places a higher bid of 1.5ETH, overriding Bobs position as the leader, sends Bobs 1 ETH back and taking 1st place
4) Dave accepts Alice's bid
5) KODA token generated and transferred to Alice, funds are split between KO and Artist
* https://www.knownorigin.io/
* BE ORIGINAL. BUY ORIGINAL.
nodes.name: ArtistAcceptingBidsV2

acceptBid(uint256).details: Method for accepting the highest bid, only called by edition creator, reverts if: - Contract is Paused - msg.sender is not the edition controller - Edition provided is not validMints a new token in KODA contractSplits bid amount to KO and Artist, based on KODA contract defined valuesRemoves current highest bid so there is no current highest bidderIf no more editions are available the auction is stopped

addAddressToWhitelist(address).details: add an address to the whitelist
addAddressToWhitelist(address).return: true if the address was added to the whitelist, false if the address was already in the whitelist

addAddressesToWhitelist(address[]).return: true if at least one address was added to the whitelist, false if all addresses were already in the whitelist

addedEditions().details: Returns the array of edition numbers

auctionDetails(uint256).details: Look up all the known data about the latest edition bidding roundReturns zeros for all values when not valid

cancelAuction(uint256).details: Method for cancelling an auction, only called from contract whitelistrefunds previous highest bidders bidremoves current highest bid so there is no current highest bidder

checkRole(address,string).details: reverts if addr does not have role

params._role: the name of the role // reverts

disableEdition(uint256).details: Disables the edition for auctionsOnly callable from whitelist

editionController(uint256).details: Check which address can action a bid for the given edition

enableEdition(uint256).details: Enables the edition for auctionsOnly callable from whitelist

enableEditionForArtist(uint256).details: Enables the edition for auctions in a single callOnly callable from whitelisted account or KODA edition artists

highestBidForEdition(uint256).details: Look up all the current highest bidder for the latest editionReturns zeros for all values when not valid

increaseBid(uint256).details: Public method for increasing your bid, reverts if: - Contract is Paused - Edition provided is not valid - Edition provided is not configured for auctions - Edition provided is sold out - msg.sender is not the current highest bidder

isEditionEnabled(uint256).details: Check an edition is enabled for auction

manualDeleteEditionBids(uint256,address).details: Manual override method removing bidding valuesOnly callable from whitelist

manualOverrideEditionHighestBidAndBidder.details: Manual override method for setting edition highest bid & the highest bidder to the provided addressOnly callable from whitelist

pause().details: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

placeBid(uint256).details: Public method for placing a bid, reverts if: - Contract is Paused - Edition provided is not valid - Edition provided is not configured for auctions - Edition provided is sold out - msg.sender is already the highest bidder - msg.value is not greater than highest bid + minimum amountrefunds the previous bidders ether if the bid is overwritten

rejectBid(uint256).details: Public method for increasing your bid, reverts if: - Contract is Paused - Edition provided is not valid - Edition provided is not configured for auctions - Edition provided is sold out - msg.sender is not the current highest bidder

removeAddressFromWhitelist(address).details: remove an address from the whitelist
removeAddressFromWhitelist(address).return: true if the address was removed from the whitelist, false if the address wasn't in the whitelist in the first place

removeAddressesFromWhitelist(address[]).return: true if at least one address was removed from the whitelist, false if all addresses weren't in the whitelist in the first place

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

setArtistsControlAddress(uint256,address.details: Sets the edition artist control addressOnly callable from whitelist

setArtistsControlAddressAndEnabledEditio.details: Sets the edition artist control address and enables the edition for auctionOnly callable from whitelist

setKoCommissionAccount(address).details: Sets the KODA addressOnly callable from whitelist

setKodavV2(address).details: Sets the KODA addressOnly callable from whitelist

setMinBidAmount(uint256).details: Sets the minimum bid amountOnly callable from whitelist

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params._newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().details: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

whitelist(address).details: getter to determine if address is in whitelist

withdrawBid(uint256).details: Public method for withdrawing your bid, reverts if: - Contract is Paused - msg.sender is not the current highest bidderremoves current highest bid so there is no current highest bidder

withdrawStuckEther(address).details: Allows for the ability to extract ether so we can distribute to the correct bidders accordinglyOnly callable from whitelist

withdrawStuckEtherOfAmount(address,uint2.details: Allows for the ability to extract specific ether amounts so we can distribute to the correct bidders accordinglyOnly callable from whitelist

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
